[calendars]
[[one]]
path = {calpath}
color = dark blue

[[two]]
path = {calpath2}
color = dark green

[[three]]
path = {calpath3}

[locale]
timeformat = %H:%M
dateformat = %Y-%m-%d %a
longdateformat = %Y-%m-%d %a
datetimeformat = %Y-%m-%d %a %H:%M
longdatetimeformat = %Y-%m-%d %a %H:%M
firstweekday = 0
weeknumbers = right

[default]
{default_calendar}
timedelta = {delta}
print_new = {print_new}

[sqlite]
path = {dbpath}
